content: जप {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जप्-कर्तरि अच्] {@--1@} Muttering, whispering. --पः {1} Muttering prayers, repeating prayers &c. in an under-tone. {@--2@} Repeating passages of the Veda or names of deities &c.; <ls>Ms. 3. 74</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 22.</ls> {@--3@} A muttered prayer. {@--4@} Counting silently the beads of a rosary &c.
